title: Add comprehensive SEO enhancements for search engine discoverability

requirements.text: Add meta tags to frontend/index.html including title, description, and keywords optimized for crochet tutorials, project sharing, and crafting community

quotes: Meta tags for search engines (title, description, keywords)

acceptanceCriteria: HTML head contains descriptive meta title tag
Meta description tag accurately describes the app's core features
Meta keywords tag includes relevant crochet and crafting terms

requirements.text: Implement Open Graph meta tags in frontend/index.html for rich social media previews on Facebook and LinkedIn, including og:title, og:description, og:image, og:url, and og:type

quotes: Open Graph tags for social media sharing (Facebook, LinkedIn)

acceptanceCriteria: All required Open Graph tags are present in HTML head
og:image points to a suitable preview image for the crocheting app
Social media platforms display rich previews when the app URL is shared

requirements.text: Add Twitter Card meta tags in frontend/index.html including twitter:card, twitter:title, twitter:description, and twitter:image for enhanced Twitter previews

quotes: Twitter Card tags for Twitter previews

acceptanceCriteria: Twitter Card tags are properly formatted in HTML head
Card type is set to summary_large_image for visual appeal
Twitter displays preview card when app URL is shared

requirements.text: Add JSON-LD structured data markup to frontend/index.html defining the app as a WebApplication with schema.org vocabulary, including name, description, applicationCategory, and offers properties

quotes: Structured data markup for better Google understanding

acceptanceCriteria: Valid JSON-LD script tag is present in HTML
Schema type is set to WebApplication
Structured data validates using Google's Rich Results Test
Free access is clearly indicated in the offers property

requirements.text: Update semantic HTML elements across key pages (HomePage, TutorialsPage, ProjectsGalleryPage) to use proper heading hierarchy (h1, h2, h3) and ARIA landmarks for improved accessibility and SEO
acceptanceCriteria: Each page has exactly one h1 tag representing the main heading
Heading hierarchy follows logical order without skipping levels
Main content areas use appropriate semantic HTML5 elements (main, article, section, nav)

requirements.text: Add a canonical link tag in frontend/index.html to prevent duplicate content issues when the app is accessible via multiple URLs
acceptanceCriteria: Canonical link tag is present in HTML head
Tag points to the primary app URL

constraints: Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain the existing warm craft-inspired visual theme and design consistency
Keep all app features free and accessible without payment requirements
nonGoals: Setting up custom domain configuration (user responsibility)

required: Social media preview image showing crochet hooks, yarn, and finished projects in warm craft-inspired aesthetic (og-preview.dim_1200x630.png)
